author: danil_2461
long_description:
KetchupLand is a work-in-progress free and open-source 3D open-world adventure sandbox game, built on the Luanti voxel game engine and made in the style of old games from the Windows 95 era, complete with 256 color VGA graphics. Collect resources to survive the harsh caves, dry deserts, hot volcanoes and freezing tundras of the land of the ketchup, harvesting tomatoes and exploring the vast worlds and beautiful biomes for better resources and tomatoes.

KetchupLand is a fork of the KetchupTest game originally developed by Tim7 and licensed under the MIT license.
name: ketchupland
short_description: A game with tomatoes, ketchup, and mese.
title: KetchupLand
